mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review VALUES (0, #{user_no}, #{item_no}, #{rev_title}, #{rev_content}, #{rev_score}, now(), now())
mapper.update: UPDATE review SET rev_title=#{rev_title}, rev_content=#{rev_content}, rev_rdate=now() WHERE rev_no=#{rev_no}
mapper.select: SELECT rev_no, item_no, user.user_no, user.user_id, rev_title, rev_content, rev_score, rev_udate FROM review JOIN user ON review.user_no = user.user_no WHERE item_no = #{item_no} ORDER BY rev_udate DESC LIMIT 3
